description:
Find one at Walmart - https://lon.tv/8rzje (compensated affiliate link) - Walmart's latest Google TV box adds some neat features like acting as a voice assistant when the TV is off and a remote finder. But it's Pro designation will fall short for enthusiasts. See more TV boxes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsYq-QL5kV_6r4LOabRltxy and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
